text: Singiripalayam is a panchayat village in Gobichettipalayam taluk in Erode District of Tamil Nadu state, India. It is about 14 km from Gobichettipalayam and 42 km from district headquarters Erode. The village is located on the road connecting Gobichettipalayam with Sathyamangalam. Singiripalayam has a population of about 820. ==References== Category:Villages in Erode district
title: Singiripalayam
